text: Michiel Frans van Hulten (born February 18, 1969 in Lelystad) is a Dutch former politician of the Labour Party (PvdA). He is currently Director of Transparency International EU. Van Hulten was an MEP from 1999 to 2004, and Chair of the Labour Party from 2005 to 2007 (succeeded by Lilianne Ploumen). His father is retired politician Michel van Hulten. == Other websites == * Bio Michiel van Hulten at Parlement.com Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch party chairs Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:People from Flevoland
title: Michiel van Hulten
